h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: Any chance you get where you're able to make him stagger backward, keep attacking. When he appears to be losing his balance, he'll be slower to get back into his pattern of attacks and you can keep finishing combos and use your Focus points for heavier attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Boss - Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
Any chance you get where you're able to make him stagger backward, keep attacking. When he appears to be losing his balance, he'll be slower to get back into his pattern of attacks and you can keep finishing combos and use your Focus points for heavier attacks.
